fields.description:
*Create trigger email templates:* 
 # *Subject Line* – We found these [Category L2] ads for you.  
 # *Pre-header* - You replied to ["Ad Title"]. You may be also interested in these ads.
 # *Number of ads*: Displaying 1 or max 8 ads  
 # *Design:* ZA: zpl.io/a3xXMJW / zpl.io/2px1pWo / zpl.io/aM5dylJ
 SG, IE, PL: zpl.io/am1DGX3 / zpl.io/2yJk4jL
 MX: zpl.io/brm1d7e / zpl.io/ag98lXQ
 AR: zpl.io/aNBwlqe / zpl.io/am1DGK3
 # *Refer users by their first names in the email:* For registered user, use[first name] [first name]. For non-registered user, use the "name" when user replied to the ad. 
 # *Please change the currency symbol for each country* 
 ** ZA: R 200
 ** SG: $ 200
 ** IE: € 200
 ** PL: 200 zł
 ** MX: $ 200
 ** AR: $ 200
 # *Mileage:* Show mileage only if it has this attribute, if not --> hide from the email
 # *View details:* The "View details" link links to the VIP page of the ad
 # *Number of ad cards*: If we have even number of ads, 2,4,6, max 8, please don't show the last card with words "See more [L2 Category] ads on gumtree.co.za"; If we have odd number of ads, please show the last card on the current design.
 # *Header links*: "Inmuebles en Venta" links to [https://www.vivanuncios.com.mx/s-venta-inmuebles/v1c1097p1] // "CategoryL2" links to user reply's L2 Category (e.g.{color:#333333}[Bienes raíces|https://www.vivanuncios.com.mx/s-inmuebles/v1c30p1]{color}) with L0 location (all country) // "CategoryL3" links to user reply's L3 Category (e.g.Inmuebles en Venta ) with L0 location (all country)
 # *View All Results & Browse Links:* Link to user reply's leaf category and L2 location (L0 = all country, L1 = state, L2 = city; we want to use city here). 
 # *Please make each of the ad card clickable--- the entire area.* 

    *    *14. *Add UTMs to all links.* 
|utm|Value|Explanation|
|utm_medium|email|The channel is email|
|utm_source|system|Anything that gets sent from the system bolt|
|utm_campaign|automated-recommendations|
|utm_content|see full chart below |_|
|Link #|utm_content|full utm list| |
|g1|header-homepage|?utm_medium=email&utm_source=system&utm_campaign=automated-recommendations&utm_content=header-homepage| |
|g2|header-category|?utm_medium=email&utm_source=system&utm_campaign=automated-recommendations&utm_content=header-category|
|g3|header-categoryl2|?utm_medium=email&utm_source=system&utm_campaign=automated-recommendations&utm_content=header-categoryl2|
|g4|header-categoryl3|?utm_medium=email&utm_source=system&utm_campaign=automated-recommendations&utm_content=header-categoryl3|
|b[1x]|recommendation-number[x]|?utm_medium=email&utm_source=system&utm_campaign=automated-recommendations&utm_content=recommendation-number1|
|b(2x)|recommendation-number[x]|?utm_medium=email&utm_source=system&utm_campaign=automated-recommendations&utm_content=recommendation-number2|
|b(3x)|recommendation-number[x]|?utm_medium=email&utm_source=system&utm_campaign=automated-recommendations&utm_content=recommendation-number3|
|b(4x)|recommendation-number[x]|?utm_medium=email&utm_source=system&utm_campaign=automated-recommendations&utm_content=recommendation-number4|
|b(5x)|recommendation-number[x]|?utm_medium=email&utm_source=system&utm_campaign=automated-recommendations&utm_content=recommendation-number5|
|b(6x)|recommendation-number[x]|?utm_medium=email&utm_source=system&utm_campaign=automated-recommendations&utm_content=recommendation-number6|
|b(7x)|recommendation-number[x]|?utm_medium=email&utm_source=system&utm_campaign=automated-recommendations&utm_content=recommendation-number7|
|b(8x)|recommendation-number[x]|?utm_medium=email&utm_source=system&utm_campaign=automated-recommendations&utm_content=recommendation-number8|
|g5|view-all-card (if odd number of ads)|?utm_medium=email&utm_source=system&utm_campaign=automated-recommendations&utm_content=view-all-card|
|g6|view-all-button|?utm_medium=email&utm_source=system&utm_campaign=automated-recommendations&utm_content=view-all-button|
|g7|signature|?utm_medium=email&utm_source=system&utm_campaign=automated-recommendations&utm_content=signature|
|g8|browse|?utm_medium=email&utm_source=system&utm_campaign=automated-recommendations&utm_content=browse|
|g9|post-new-ad|?utm_medium=email&utm_source=system&utm_campaign=automated-recommendations&utm_content=post-new-ad|
|g10|contact-us|?utm_medium=email&utm_source=system&utm_campaign=automated-recommendations&utm_content=contact-us|
|b3|manage-preference|?utm_medium=email&utm_source=system&utm_campaign=automated-recommendations&utm_content=manage-preference|
|b5|privacy|?utm_medium=email&utm_source=system&utm_campaign=automated-recommendations&utm_content=privacy|
|b6|term|?utm_medium=email&utm_source=system&utm_campaign=automated-recommendations&utm_content=term|

 

*To Do:*
 1) Quentin to provide design for all six countries (Ticket here: https://jira.xxx.com/browse/ULIVZ-35078)
 2) Jenny to provide UTM guide for all links on page for all 6 countries (https://jira.xxx.com/browse/ULIVZ-35344)
 3) Translation through L10n ([https://ecgwiki.corp.ebay.com/display/ULIVZ/L10n+Language+Translation+Process]) [see attachment]

comments.body: Temporary mock-up attached. I will remove the image once a final mock up is ready. !Mock-up v1.png|thumbnail!
Design ticket attached, need to get the translations still https://jira.xxx.com/browse/ULIVZ-35078 [~homer]
QA estimation: 5. Based on assumptions that it needs to cover 6 sites, 3 clients and both desktop / mobile.
Check this issue for template variables.

[~spliu] [~homer] New design with only the "View Details" button has been requested for this ticket. 

"Reply now" feature has been split from this ticket and move to : 
 * Backend: https://jira.xxx.com/browse/ULIVZ-32102
 * Frontend: https://jira.xxx.com/browse/ULIVZ-35475
[~john] Thanks for the help on splitting the ticket.
Seller Email template is in sellerGeneric_en_ZA.ftl, which can be leveraged by this ticket.

Whoever will take responsibility of this ticket, please reference the template in sellerGeneric_en_ZA.ftl in bolt-platform for ZA and update upon that for other locales.
That template has verified by QA and designer. And that template will be the source of truth when there is any update.
Also - do not try to recreate the header and footer section of the email. It's meant to be the same as other recent emails created by Quentin.
[~qblanchais] For MX design  ([https://zpl.io/an160Kv)], do you still have the design that display odd number of ads? Something similar with Argentina [https://zpl.io/bLBLe1Y]

[~spielberg] Please see bullet point 13. I added a little bit recommendation criteria, so that we won't recommend any ads user has replied, or the same ads everyday for 30 days. Let's chat when you get online. Thank you! Copy [~homer] [~spliu]
[~john] Could you please create another ticket for recommendation criteria changes? That would be easier for us to split the tasks. Thanks.
[~leiychen] New ticket on recommendation criteria is created here and removed from this ticket. https://jira.xxx.com/browse/ULIVZ-38409 CC [~spielberg] [~homer]

[~john] can you provide the email subject for spanish version ?thanks
 # *Subject Line* – We found these [Category L2] ads for you.

“Tenemos estas [Category L2] anuncios para ti"

[~spielberg] If you need a placeholder, please use this for now. I will get a native speaker to proof read ASAP tomorrow and give you an update.
*Update：* Let's use utm_content=footer-homepage for signature, so that it will be aligned with other seller emails in production. [~spielberg] [~caiyuchen]
Update: &utm_content=post-new-ad for post button on footer, utm_content=privacy-policy for policy link [~spielberg]

 SG, IE, PL: zpl.io/am1DGX3 / zpl.io/2yJk4jL

 AR: zpl.io/aNBwlqe / zpl.io/am1DGK3

 ** ZA: R 200
 ** SG: $ 200
 ** IE: € 200
 ** PL: 200 zł
 ** MX: $ 200
 ** AR: $ 200
 # *Mileage:* Show mileage only if it has this attribute, if not --> hide from the email
